DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety oxidative stress potential two dos investigational IV iron , ferric carboxymaltose ( FCM ) , compare equal single dose IV iron sucrose IV iron dextran treatment Iron Deficiency Anemia ( IDA ) female subject .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Ferric Carboxymaltose ( FCM ) Versus IV Iron Sucrose IV Iron Dextran Treating Iron Deficiency Anemia Women
DOC.criteria: Female subject 1850 year age able give inform consent . If postpartum , least 10 day post delivery Day 0 . Screening Visit local laboratory Hgb < = 10 g/dL < = 12 g/dL symptom ( dizziness and/or fatigue ) . Screening Visit ferritin < = 100 ng/mL < = 300 TSAT < = 30 % . Documented unsatisfactory response intolerance oral iron . Previous participation ferric carboxymaltose ( FCM ) clinical trial . Known hypersensitivity reaction component ferric carboxymaltose , Venofer , Dexferrum . History drug allergy history rheumatoid arthritis autoimmune disease . Current anemia attribute iron deficiency . During 10 day period prior screen treat antibiotic . During 30 day period prior screen study period treat erythropoiesis stimulating agent . Active malignancy within 5 year . Basal squamous cell skin cancer exclusionary . During 30 day period prior screen study period require surgical procedure necessitate general anesthesia . Current ( acute chronic ) infection viral upper respiratory tract infection . AST ALT screen great 1.5 time upper limit normal . Known positive hepatitis B evidence active hepatitis . Known positive HIV1/HIV2 antibody ( antiHIV ) . Patient active diagnosis asthma currently use anti asthmatic therapy . Received investigational drug within 30 day screen . Alcohol drug abuse within past 6 month . Hemochromatosis iron storage disorder . Systolic blood pressure > = 180 < 80 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > = 100 < 40 mmHg screen Day 0 . Chronic kidney disease . Chronic inflammatory condition include limited Lupus Rheumatoid Arthritis . Preterm delivery < 32 week . Emergent Csection delivery . Significant cardiovascular disease , include limited myocardial infarction unstable angina within 6 month prior study inclusion current history NYHA Class III IV congestive heart failure . Any laboratory abnormality , medical condition psychiatric disorder opinion investigator put subject 's disease management risk may result subject unable comply study requirement . Night shift worker . Breastfeeding plan Day 0 . Pregnant sexuallyactive female subject childbearing potential n't use acceptable form contraception .
